text: Duke Moore, (July 15, 1913 as James Moore – November 16, 1976), was an American actor who has the distinction of spending his entire on-screen career in productions by Ed Wood. Between 1953 and 1970, Moore appeared in the following for Wood: *Crossroads of Laredo *Final Curtain *Night of the Ghouls *Plan 9 from Outer Space *The Sinister Urge *Take it Out in Trade Moore also received a posthumous addition to his oeuvre when outtake footage to Take it out in Trade was found in a projectionist's booth in a pornographic theater in California and subsequently released on video in "as is" form. This footage can be seen in Take it Out in Trade: The Outtakes. Duke died in Hollywood of a heart attack. ==External links== * * Category:American male film actors Category:1913 births Category:1976 deaths Category:20th-century American male actors
title: Duke Moore
